resources.string: Starting five days before your colonoscopy, avoid nuts and seeds.

Follow a clear fluid diet the day before your colonoscopy. This includes coffee, tea with sugar but no milk, clear broth soups, Gatorade, soft drinks, and jello (not red or blue). Do not have red liquids or solids of any kind.
Drink 3-4 liters of fluids the day before your colonoscopy.
Take your PICO_SALAX and Dulcolax tablets when notifed, as described in the instructions. They can be purchased at any pharmacy without prescription.
